item.title: CVE-2019-1010136|2024-08-05T03:07:18.246Z -- chinamobile -- gpn2.4p21-c-cn
item.description: ChinaMobile GPN2.4P21-C-CN W2001EN-00 is affected by: Incorrect Access Control - Unauthenticated Remote Reboot. The impact is: PLC Wireless Router's are vulnerable to an unauthenticated remote reboot due. The component is: Reboot settings are available to unauthenticated users instead of only authenticaed users. The attack vector is: Remote.
